metadata.name: Martha Speaks
metadata.summary: A lovable family dog with the power of speech who helps children understand words.
metadata.description: Martha is outspoken, confident, smart and has an amazing vocabulary. She loves learning -- and using -- new words. Her best friend is 10-year-old Helen, who acts as Martha's voice of reason (not that Martha always listens!).
metadata.keywords: PBS, PBS KIDS, kids, children, children's programming, cartoons, educational, reading
